text: Why play a zero sum game anywayIt s a zero sum game as in we only do things because we convince ourselves they re worthwhile  but they aren t  because nothing is  There s no meaning unless we make one  Only reason things are enjoyable painful funny sad annoying extraordinary etc  is because we re wired to perceive them that way  Might as well let go of all that  There s no inherent value in nothing out there  One could easily delude himself and make a random small thing the most important thing in the world and find all meaning he wants in it  So why bother chasing the primitive ones imposed on us  Sorry for rambling  it s hard to express my thoughts in english

text: Tinnitus makes me want to kill myselfI ve been struggling with suicidal thoughts for years now  but it was always triggered by something that could be helped  Sometimes it was loneliness  extreme stress  feelings of inadequacy  but now it feels different  This time it s something that can t be fixed  I ve been dealing with my tinnitus for a month now  and I know many people say they ve learned to live with it eventually  but I really can t see myself continuing on with this constant loud ringing in my ear  I can t focus on anything unless I mask it with a loud fan  and even then sometimes it s hard to ignore  I m sure people have worse problems than I do  people tell me that a lot  But this is me  I can t deal with it  It doesn t matter if others can  I m honestly not sure why I m here talking about this  Maybe I just wanted someplace to vent my thoughts  For a long time now I ve thought that I don t really mind dying  even if it wasn t during times where I actively wanted to die  The only reason I m still here now is because I m scared of surviving the attempt  or what may come afterwards  if there is an afterlife  I m also scared it will hurt a lot  I don t know what to do anymore

text: I m going through with it this SundayFor the last few months  I ve been planning my suicide  My depression has gotten really bad lately  and I can t take it anymore  I fucked up my life so hard  I can t fix it The funniest part is that I ve been so miserable these last few months and yet nobody has noticed  My parents  my youngest brother  my friends  none of them have the slightest inkling of what I ve been going through  They think I m your regular sweet fifteen year old girl  doing well in school and pursuing her dreams  What a joke  I m an utter failure and the only reason no one knows is because I lie about everything these days My parents are blissfully ignorant  They might even be in denial  When I was around twelve  I was severely depressed and cut myself daily  They caught me  punished me  and I stopped for a few months  I never got any help  professional or otherwise  just punishment and shame  Rinse and repeat for a couple of years  until I learned how to hide my cuts and emotions well enough to pass  They ignore all my symptoms  I could tell them that I m going to kill myself and they wouldn t do a thing Maybe they want me to die  They have my brother and my step brothers  They have their own little families now with their perfect sons  They don t need me I m through with being exhausted and miserable everyday  The world will be just the same without me  Hopefully death is just nothingness  like a never ending dreamless sleep  I don t care if I have to go through hours of pain or only twenty minutes  I m going for the home run  My method will be fatal  I refuse to be stitched back together and forced to live the rest of my life trapped in a shell of my former self Basically what I m saying is  I m done with trying to live for others  Maybe I m okay with being selfish for once  So I m going through with it
summary: This Sunday I'm going to kill myself. My depression has gotten really bad lately and I can't take it anymore. My parents are blissfully ignorant and might be in denial. They ignore all my symptoms. They have their own little families now with their perfect sons and don't need me.
cleaned: sunday go kill depression get bad lately not anymore parent blissfully ignorant denial ignore symptom little family perfect son not need
